title: Jeremy McGrath for Be The Match
description:
Continuing our support of Jeremy McGrath and Be The Match, we've launched our first "SPY Athletes for Action" fundraising campaign at www.spyathletesforaction.com. October 29 through November 12, buy a $40 SPY online gift certificate and SPY will give $20 to Be The Match in support of their bone marrow registry. 

If you'd like to join MC, SPY athletes and employees on Team MC and have the chance of winning some rad gear, click on the JOIN tab on the fundraising page and follow the simple steps to spread the message. Thanks so much for your support!
